name: BasilJapan
description:
If you want to support my work and keep me motivated to produce more content, you could buy me a coffee or tea:

https://ko-fi.com/gswan

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/gswan
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is the first trained model for Basil Japan, who trained with many Japanese and Non-Japanese people and models.

More than 50% are Japanese though.

IT can create portrait, landscape, sceneries.

It can portrait, Japanese, North American, Latin people.


This model has better aesthetics and fewer artifacts; it is a Full Model.

Works good with LORAS.

Prompts:

👍Positive prompt prefix:

natural light,

👎Negative prompt prefix:

(raw photo), EasyNegative, badhandv5, (worst quality, low quality:1.4)

Neg prompt embeddings:

https://civitai.com/models/30452/bad-hands

https://civitai.com/models/7808/easynegative

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: This model has better aesthetics and fewer artifacts.
